ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that only the "Related Domain Binding SObject" or the "Related Domain Binding SObject Alternate" field is specified and not both.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK( RelatedDomainBindingSObject__c ) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( RelatedDomainBindingSObjectAlternate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only specify the "Related Domain Binding SObject" field or the "Related Domain Binding SObject Alternate" field; not both.
